actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

official_title: Expressing the sense of Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued in honor of Ava Gardner on her 100th birthday.

summary.text: This concurrent resolution expresses the sense of Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued in honor of actress Ava Gardner on her 100th birthday, her iconic status, and lasting contributions to international cinema, global fashion, and humanitarian causes.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued in honor of Ava Gardner on her 100th birthday.
Expressing the sense of Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued in honor of Ava Gardner on her 100th birthday.
